objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_Filter
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_GetSubFolderByType
objects.description: Returns the sub-folder by its type, based on naming conventions. Searches for any child folder of the parentFolderId that contains the input folderType, and returns the parentFolderId if no child is found.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_IsOnPortal
objects.description: Returns true if loggedInUser() = "Anonymous" meaning the context is on the portal

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_MergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
objects.description: The main rule to merge the ID-output of a write records nodes to the input process variable (including all child FKs). IMPORTANT NOTES in comments in the rule.

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_RejectBlank
objects.description: Rule to removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: CMGT_UTIL_SetRecordFields
objects.description: Runs a bulk update on a record object, setting new values for its fields
